org.jivesoftware.smackx.muc.MultiUserChat

  • Packages that use MultiUserChat 
    Package Description
    org.jivesoftware.smackx.muc
    Classes and Interfaces that implement Multi-User Chat (MUC) as defined in XEP-45.
